name: Splashy Turd - v3.0 ( Heaven Showdown )
description:
Game Information:

Fly your way through countless amount of crates and score points used to buy in-game items coming in the near future, The game will be playable on a larger screen once I finish implementing the game into an actual site.

HI CHASE

Made By DungleBox Inc.

  • Loader Page
  • New Character
  • Splash Sound
  • New Update Info Page
  • Pipes Are Now Crates
  • High Score System Now Implemented
  • Updated Game Over Menu
  • Score Font Updated To "Revalia"
  • Twitter Button Rotation
  • Performance Enhancement
  • Bug Fixes
